title: Nadia's Family Feasts
overview: Each episode of Nadia's Family Feasts is themed around a different cuisine from British to Italian via Chinese, French, North American, Middle Eastern and more.Nadia Sawalha takes inspiration from busy households around the world as she seeks new ideas for recipes that will fit into hectic schedules.Each week, Nadia is joined by a guest chef with a passion or expertise in that cuisine. Together they cook a full day's menu, with four dishes to create a breakfast, lunch, dinner and a sweet treat.
